scan_table_check.description:
A global Business Rule is any Business Rule where the selected Table is Global. Any other script can call global Business Rules. Global Business Rules have no condition or table restrictions and load on every page in the system. Most functions defined in global Business Rules are fairly specific, such as an advanced reference qualifier on one field of one form. There is no benefit to loading this kind of script on every page.
Script includes only load when called.
scan_table_check.name: Use Script Includes Instead of Global Business Rules
scan_table_check.resolution_details: If you have already written a global Business Rule, move the function definition to a Script Include. The name of the Script Include must match the name of the function for the Script Include to work properly. There is no need to modify any calls to the named function.
